name: Divine Dragon - Excelion
text: When this card is Normal Summoned, it gets 1 of the following effects for each "Divine Dragon - Excelion" in your Graveyard when this effect resolves (your choice). These effects cannot accumulate. â—? This card gains 1000 ATK. â—? If this card destroys your opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row. â—? When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.
